Sql.query: insert into trn_trans_infobase( tinfbcodi, coinfbcodi , barrcodi ,pericodi ,emprcodi ,equicodi ,tinfbcodigo , tinfbversion ,tinfbtipoinformacion ,tinfbestado ,tinfbusername , tinfbfecins, trnenvcodi ) values (:tinfbcodi,:coinfbcodi,:barrcodi,:pericodi,:emprcodi,:equicodi,:tinfbcodigo, :tinfbversion,:tinfbtipoinformacion,:tinfbestado,:tinfbusername,:tinfbfecins, :trnenvcodi)
update trn_trans_infobase set tinfbestado = :tinfbestado, tinfbfecact = :tinfbfecact where pericodi = :pericodi and tinfbversion = :tinfbversion and emprcodi = :emprcodi
update trn_trans_infobase set tinfbestado = :tinfbestado, tinfbfecact = :tinfbfecact where pericodi = :pericodi and tinfbversion = :tinfbversion and emprcodi = :emprcodi and coinfbcodi = :coinfbcodi
delete from trn_trans_infobase where pericodi= :pericodi and tinfbversion =:tinfbversion and tinfbcodigo = :tinfbcodigo and trnenvcodi is null
delete from trn_trans_infobase where pericodi= :pericodi and tintfbversion =:tintfbversion

select tinfbcodigo, (select emprnomb from vw_si_empresa where vw_si_empresa.emprcodi = trn_trans_infobase.emprcodi) as emprnombre, (select equinomb from vw_eq_equipo_trn_coinfb where vw_eq_equipo_trn_coinfb.equicodi = trn_trans_infobase.equicodi) as centgenenombre, trn_barra.barrbarratransferencia, tinfbtipoinformacion, ( select sum( tinfbde1 +tinfbde2+ tinfbde3+ tinfbde4+ tinfbde5+ tinfbde6+ tinfbde7+ tinfbde8+ tinfbde9+ tinfbde10+ tinfbde11+ tinfbde12+ tinfbde13+ tinfbde14+ tinfbde15+ tinfbde16+ tinfbde17+ tinfbde18+ tinfbde19+ tinfbde20+ tinfbde21+ tinfbde22+ tinfbde23+ tinfbde24+ tinfbde25+ tinfbde26+ tinfbde27+ tinfbde28+ tinfbde29+ tinfbde30+ tinfbde31+ tinfbde32+ tinfbde33+ tinfbde34+ tinfbde35+ tinfbde36+ tinfbde37+ tinfbde38+ tinfbde39+ tinfbde40+ tinfbde41+ tinfbde42+ tinfbde43+ tinfbde44+ tinfbde45+ tinfbde46+ tinfbde47+ tinfbde48+ tinfbde49+ tinfbde50+ tinfbde51+ tinfbde52+ tinfbde53+ tinfbde54+ tinfbde55+ tinfbde56+ tinfbde57+ tinfbde58+ tinfbde59+ tinfbde60+ tinfbde61+ tinfbde62+ tinfbde63+ tinfbde64+ tinfbde65+ tinfbde66+ tinfbde67+ tinfbde68+ tinfbde69+ tinfbde70+ tinfbde71+ tinfbde72+ tinfbde73+ tinfbde74+ tinfbde75+ tinfbde76+ tinfbde77+ tinfbde78+ tinfbde79+ tinfbde80+ tinfbde81+ tinfbde82+ tinfbde83+ tinfbde84+ tinfbde85+ tinfbde86+ tinfbde87+ tinfbde88+ tinfbde89+ tinfbde90+ tinfbde91+ tinfbde92+ tinfbde93+ tinfbde94+ tinfbde95+ tinfbde96) from trn_trans_infobase_detalle where trn_trans_infobase_detalle.tinfbcodi =trn_trans_infobase.tinfbcodi
)as total from trn_trans_infobase join trn_barra on trn_barra.barrcodi = trn_trans_infobase.barrcodi where (emprcodi = :emprcodi ) and (pericodi= :pericodi or :pericodi is null) and (tinfbversion = :tinfbversion) order by tinfbcodigo asc
select * from trn_trans_infobase where (emprcodi = :emprcodi or :emprcodi = 0) and pericodi = :pericodi and tinfbversion = :tinfbversion and tinfbcodigo = :tinfbcodigo order by tinfbcodi desc
select * from trn_trans_infobase where pericodi = :pericodi and tinfbversion = :tinfbversion

select * from trn_trans_infobase where (emprcodi = :emprcodi or :emprcodi = 0) and pericodi = :pericodi and tinfbversion = :tinfbversion and (trnenvcodi = :trnenvcodi or trnenvcodi is null) and tinfbcodigo = :tinfbcodigo order by tinfbcodi desc
